ygData.subject: Re: characters
ygData.msgSnippet: This must be a big Drinal gathering place . . . bigger than Everlore, where NO ONE responded to my post about the goings-on in LFAydark. I have two characters
ygData.messageBody:
This must be a big Drinal gathering place . . .
bigger than Everlore, where NO ONE responded to my post
about the goings-on in LFAydark. I have two characters
on Drinal, but I really only play the rogue. Funny
thing is, someone here by the name of Layline said in
an earlier post that he is on Drinal -- I was
looking back at some screenshots, and saw their corpse!
So, guess we've already run into each other, Layline
. . .<br><br>Kharlisht of Kaladim<br>12th season
Dwarf Rogue<br><br>Nazbeku<br>2nd level Troll SK
